ygData.subject: Re: Languages
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes its set levels.  I just received Combine (Giant Tongue) around level 20. Zolthar ... research.  Please keep the emails on topic.
ygData.messageBody:
Yes its set levels. I just received Combine (Giant Tongue) around level 20.

Zolthar

At 12:53 AM 5/11/99 -0700, you wrote:
>From: <kalekona@...>
>
>Rangers are not the only class to get Gnoll.
>
>My Dark Elf Necromancer received Gnoll from the guildmaster
>at a certain level.
>I still think that it is a set level that you receive
>certain languages at all.
>
>
>
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>Got an opinion?
>http://www.onelist.com
>Make it count! Sign up for the ONElist Weekly Survey now.
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>This list is intended for the trade of Spell components for spell
research. Please keep the emails on topic.
>
>
>
